attributes.action: Legalise the use of all recreational drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Case for legalisation of recreational drugs

I have come to the view that recreational drugs should be legalised I will out line some key points below.



For many years prohibition has been key government policy on the war against drugs. This has caused the following 

Vast profits for criminal gangs
Criminalization of drug addicts
Increase of crime on our streets
Prisons filled to over capacity
Destabilization of countries (Afghanistan, and others) 

These are just a few of the problems that prohibition has cause.

It is accepted that legalizing drug may increase there use but the benefits to our society far out way any down sides.

Cut the criminal gangs income
Reduce the prison population
Reduce the crime on our streets
Provide proper care for drug addicts
Create jobs
Provide vast tax revenues for government
Provide information on recreational drugs
Create legal industries for countries in south america and places like afghanistan (may also help to end the war)
